page.title: 01A GENERAL VIEW
page.content: Our area block is comprised of the old village of North Hykeham and the village of South Hykeham. North hykehm as a whole is now a town with a population of about 1200. Although our survey only covers a small part of North Hykeham. South Hykeham was once more important as a village but now it is not. The reason for this could be that North Hykeham is situated nearer to Lincoln and also that it has better road and rail links to other towns so allowing industry to grow. Most of our area however is taken up by agriculture and residential use and no industrial sites. {HYKEHAM}is a flourishing town and has its own library, youth centre, shopping and sports complex as well as a health centre.
